headline: A Look At Lululemon Athletica’s Valuation As Founder Dennis Wilson Moves To Regain Board Influence
summary: Dennis J. Wilson has moved to reassert influence at lululemon athletica (LULU). He says he plans to file a proxy statement to nominate his own board slate and introduce a business proposal at the 2026 annual meeting. See our latest analysis for lululemon athletica. Wilson’s move comes after a tough stretch for the stock, with a 1 month share price return of 21.21% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of 58.70% decline, even as recent endorsements and buyout speculation have lifted...
